description:
Role: Supply Chain manager

Location: Santa Ana, CA - 92705

Duration: 18 Months

Key Responsibilities

  • Assess and resolve trade compliance issues for our global organization and vendor facilities.
  • Develop and implement strategies and processes for import brokerage and export licensing across global locations.
  • Facilitate communication with U.S. and global government agencies regarding goods movement.
  • Conduct product classification assessments to meet import and export requirements.
  • Establish processes for product qualification under various government Free Trade Agreements.
  • Lead the implementation of automated trade compliance systems globally. Provide guidance to departments on compliance with trade laws and regulations.
  • Undertake other projects and duties as assigned.

Education And Experience

  • Bachelor's Degree required.
  • Understanding and experience with U.S. and global trade compliance laws and regulations.
  • 2+ years of import and export experience or Customs Brokerage experience preferred.
